title: Add Current Rank Display Box to Dashboard

requirements.summary: Add a rank display box to the Dashboard page showing the user's current rank label and color, styled to match the existing level display box, using getRank from rankUtils.ts
acceptanceCriteria: A new rank box is visible on the Dashboard page alongside the level box
The rank box displays the current rank label (e.g., 'E Rank', 'D Rank', 'Shadow Monarch') derived from the user's level
The rank label text is colored using the rank color from rankUtils.ts
The rank box matches the visual style (card shape, sizing, typography) of the existing level display box
The rank box updates correctly when the user's level changes

file_operations.description: Add a new rank display box adjacent to the existing level display box in the dashboard layout. Import getRank from utils/rankUtils.ts and use it to derive the rank object from userProfile.level. Display the rank label with inline styling using the rank color. Ensure the box structure mirrors the level box Card component styling (same dimensions, padding, typography, and card appearance).
